sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './landingpage.css' import NavBar from './NavBar' import logo from '../assets/Logo1.png' const OurStory = () => { return( <>
Our Story

One winter day, Kenneth, SimBull Co-founder and CEO, was watching the NFL Draft Combine and absolutely fanboying over Joe Burrows. However, there was no way he could make money from predicting Joe Burrow is going to be one of the best in the league since he knew that the Bengals were going to be bad the first year and maybe even the first couple years while Burrow was developing.

But, then a thought popped into his head, “What if there was a long term market for sports where you could trade teams like stocks?” From that day on, he has been on a mission to create a way for people to profit and enjoy sports in the long term.

Since then, we have been working hard to figure out how to make that dream into a reality.

We are a group of friends who are avid sports gamblers, investors, and finance professionals trying to build the best long-term sports market that eliminates the sportsbook’s edge so we can enjoy sports like never before.
) } export default OurStory
